articles.author: Megan Liscomb
articles.title: "Just Got Our First Tariff Bill": Americans Are Sharing How They're Already Seeing Trump's Tariffs Affect Their Lives And Businesses - BuzzFeed
articles.description: "The product cost is $524 and the tariff charge is $890."
articles.content: "They want it to be the '50s so badly, and part of that mentality is 'BUY AMERICAN!' but we are SOOOOO far beyond that. It's nearly impossible to only buy American these days. Plus, we're all in such… [+438 chars]
